body_html:
On Windows 7 x64, Anaconda 2, python 2.7 :

  1. Download Build Tools for Visual Studio 2017

  2. clean conda cached packages
    conda clean -a

  3. Download cpu only packages
    conda create -n test python=3.6 numpy pyyaml mkl
    activate test
    conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch

  4. A quick test
    python -c "import torch"

Works beautifully on my machine. Thanks so much for the effort! @peterjc123
body_text:
On Windows 7 x64, Anaconda 2, python 2.7 :


Download Build Tools for Visual Studio 2017


clean conda cached packages
conda clean -a


Download cpu only packages
conda create -n test python=3.6 numpy pyyaml mkl
activate test
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch


A quick test
python -c "import torch" 


Works beautifully on my machine. Thanks so much for the effort! @peterjc123
body:
On Windows 7 x64, Anaconda 2, python 2.7 :

1. Download [Build Tools for Visual Studio 2017](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/42696948/how-can-i-install-the-vs2017-version-of-msbuild-on-a-build-server-without-instal)

2. clean conda cached packages 
` conda clean -a `

3. Download cpu only packages
 `conda create -n test python=3.6 numpy pyyaml mkl`
`activate test`
`conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch`

4. A quick test
`python -c "import torch" `

Works beautifully on my machine. Thanks so much for the effort! @peterjc123
